text: Hanki nomagi vahe'mo'zama Ra Anumzamofo mono noma azeri oti tra'ma ki vagamaretazage'za, pristi naga'moza pristi kukena eri nentani'za, ufena enerizage'za, Asapu ne' mofavre Livae naga'mo'za nase'nasepa eri'zage'za, Israeli kini ne' Deviti'ma krente'nea kante amage ante'za Ra Anumzamofo agi ahentesga hunaku oti'naze.
